department: PSPC (Department of Public Works and Government Services)

description: AMENDMENT TO CLOSING TIME: Please disregard the Ariba Discovery posting response deadline closing time and BuyandSell posting closing time. All required supporting documentation and bid submission must be submitted by December 11th, 2023 at 14:00 PM EST. All bids submitted after 14:00 PM EDT will result in the bid being declared non-responsive.
full_summary:
### Enterprise Engineering and Deployment Services (EEDS) - Solicitation

**Reference Number**: WS4223062835
**Solicitation Number**: WS4223062835
**Publication Date**: October 12, 2023
**Closing Date**: December 11, 2023, 14:00 PM EST
**Amendment Number**: 8

#### Tender Details

* The solicitation seeks Informatics professional services to provide development, support, and engineering activities for Director Information Management Engineering and Integration (DIMEI) and the Defence 365 (D365) Program.
* The services will cover design, technical support, and engineering tasks.
* The contract will be awarded to the bidder with the highest combined rating for technical merit and price.

#### Eligibility

* Bidders must meet the requirements specified in the solicitation document.
* Bidders are eligible to participate in this solicitation under the following trade agreements: Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement, Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement, Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership (CPTPP), Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA), Canada-UK Trade Continuity Agreement, Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement, Canada-Ukraine Free Trade Agreement, Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement, World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA), Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement, Canadian Free Trade Agreement, and Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement.

#### Award Criteria

* The contract will be awarded to the bidder with the highest combined rating for technical merit and price.
* Bidders must submit all required supporting documentation and bid submissions by the closing date and time.

#### Contact Information

* Contracting entity: Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
* Contact person: Anna MacIntosh, anna.macintosh@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca
* Bid submission instructions: Bidders must submit their bids through Ariba Discovery or BuyandSell, with a deadline of December 11, 2023, 14:00 PM EST.

Note that I grouped related information together for easier reading and also reformatted the text to fit the 400-word limit. All necessary details are included and relevant information is included while leaving out unnecessary details.
